name: China Oriental Group Company Limited
description: China Oriental Group Company Limited is a leading steel manufacturer based in China, dedicated to producing high-quality steel products for various applications. Founded in 1996, the company operates several production facilities equipped with advanced technology, enabling it to produce a wide range of steel products, including hot-rolled steel, cold-rolled steel, and galvanized steel. China Oriental serves a diverse customer base across multiple industries, including construction, automotive, and machinery manufacturing. The company emphasizes innovation and sustainability in its operations, investing in energy-efficient technologies and environmentally friendly practices to minimize its carbon footprint. With a focus on maintaining high production standards and enhancing customer satisfaction, China Oriental continues to expand its market presence both domestically and internationally. The company is committed to meeting the growing demand for steel products while adhering to the highest safety and quality standards.

seo.meta_title: China Oriental Group Company Limited | Leading Steel Manufacturer
seo.meta_description: Explore China Oriental Group, a top steel manufacturer in China, producing high-quality steel products for various industries. Learn about our commitment to innovation and sustainability.

faq.question: What does China Oriental Group specialize in?
faq.answer: China Oriental Group specializes in the manufacturing of high-quality steel products.

faq.question: Where is China Oriental Group headquartered?
faq.answer: China Oriental Group is headquartered in Beijing, China.

faq.question: When was China Oriental Group founded?
faq.answer: China Oriental Group was founded in 1996.

faq.question: What types of steel products does China Oriental produce?
faq.answer: The company produces hot-rolled steel, cold-rolled steel, and galvanized steel.
